title: Pineapple, chilli and lime 'carpaccio'

default: ½ fresh pineapple, peeled, hulled and sliced thinly
1 lime, cut in to wedges, to garnish

steps: Arrange the pineapple slices onto a serving plate and sprinkle over the lime zest. Drizzle over the lime juice and sprinkle over the dried chilli flakes and raspberries.
Serve garnished with the lime wedges.
